title: Redmi 13 5G, Hawaiian Blue, 8GB128GB  India Debut SD 4 Gen 2 AE  108MP Pro Grade Camera  6.79in Largest Display in Segment

script.hook: Unleash your creativity with the Redmi 13 5G – where innovation meets style!
script.pitch: Experience photography like never before with the 108MP Pro Grade Camera that transforms every shot into a masterpiece.
script.features: Capture stunning moments in any light with Night Mode and 3X In-Sensor Zoom. Plus, enjoy a massive 6.79-inch display that makes every detail pop!
script.cta: Don't miss out! Grab your Redmi 13 5G today for just ₹17900 and redefine what's possible!
visual_cues: Scene 1: Product showcase with vibrant colors and Hawaiian Blue design
Scene 2: Feature demonstration of camera in action with stunning photos
Scene 3: Happy customer using the phone in various settings
Scene 4: Strong CTA with the product on display and price highlighted

emotional_triggers: Pride in owning a high-quality camera
Need for a reliable device for everyday use
product_analysis.value_proposition: Experience premium features and superior performance at an affordable price
product_analysis.competitive_advantage: 108MP Pro Grade Camera and the largest display in its segment combined with high-performance processor and fast charging
